name: 拯救大魔王2 Rescue the Great Demon 2
description: Sino was controlled by human. Human made the rules, and annihilated every race that opposed them. Every race on this continent became slaves, except human.Demons had been enslaved for 80 years since their leader, the Great Demon was captured. This is where our story begins.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews.review_text: The thing is that the soundtrack is so good but the game itself is boring. It's so little what you can do in it.

Has a few bugs such as mixing english and japanese languages during some events in the game, sometimes being really stressing, but the game is fun, so those bugs don't really matter, overall it's a nice game to spend time.
Has potential, the English translations need work and the formatting for the text needs a fix but it's not bad for a free RPG.  Lets play video here .
